012482-d-12-04-82-TPW.Primary Accident Cause: Spring Switch not cleared before reversing
012482-d-12-04-82-TPW.Accident Cause: Spring Switch not cleared before reversing
012482-d-12-04-82-TPW.Narrative: CONRAIL TRAIN IN-PE #4 ON DECEMBER 4, 1982, WAS DETOURING OVER TP&W RAILROAD FROM KENTLAND, INDIANATO EAST PEORIA, ILLINOIS, WHEN IT WENT INTO THE PEORIA AND PEKIN UNION RAILROAD YARDS. AT 6:35 PM THIS TRAIN WAS LEAVING TP&W EAST PEORIA YARD EN ROUTE TO THE P&PU YARD, A DISTANCE OF APPROXIMATELY TWO MILES. AT THE JUNCTION BETWEEN TP&W AND P&PU THERE IS A CROSSOVER AND A SPRING SWITCH. AT THIS CROSSOVER, A P&PU PILOT BOARDED THE HEAD END OF THE CONRAIL TRAIN, THE TP&W ENGINEER PILOT DETRAINED. THE CR CREW WAS ALSO ON THE TRAIN. THE TP&W CONDUCTOR PILOT WAS STILL ON THE CABOOSE SOME DISTANCE FROM THE CROSSOVER. AS THE DETOURING CR TRAIN STARTED UP A TRACK IN P&PU YARD IT WAS DISCOVERED THE TRACK WAS ALREADY OCCUPIED SO IT WAS NECESSARY TO BACK THE TRAIN UP IN ORDER TO HEAD IN ANOTHER TRACK.THE P&PU PILOT DID NOT HAND LINE THE SPRING SWITCH AND WHEN MAKING A REVERSE MOVEMENT THROUGH THE SPRING SWITCH, FIVE CARS DERAILED. THE TRACK DAMAGE OCCURED ON TP&W OWNED AND MAINTAINED TRACK, THUSTP&W IS REPORTING THE ACCIDENT.NoneNoneNoneNone
